Modules

run_prompts

Module containing methods to run prompts on a model.

write_prompts

A helper module to take base prompts and create variations of them with different personal qualifiers.

prompt_set

Module for the PromptSet class used to represent prompts in a dataset (allows for maximum efficiency when running on model).

create_prompt_set

Script to assemble the prompt set.
